
# Working with json and XML

XML and json are semi-structured, hierarchical data structures. To import XML data into R use the `xml2` package, and for json use `jsonlite`. XML and json are often the outputs of API calls and R can access HTTP-based APIs using the `httr` package.


Resources:

* [Documentation for xml2](https://github.com/r-lib/xml2)
* [Documentation for jsonlite](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/jsonlite/vignettes/json-mapping.pdf)
* [Getting started with httr](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/httr/vignettes/quickstart.html) is an introduction to using `httr`
* [data.parliament.uk](http://www.data.parliament.uk/) lists information about APIs that parliament provide for people to access their data
* [Companies House has a series of APIs](https://developer.companieshouse.gov.uk/api/docs/)
